note: Currently working towards a linguistics degree. I am a proud Latinx person with an ADHD and ASD twist. My dream is to help disenfranchised and displaced migrants with my growing skills of language. I truly hope that with language I can offer some agency in the battle against institutional racism at the souther border. The injustice imposed upon my brown sisteren and brethren who daily migrate to this nation is antithetical to my vision of our future.
